Text: You can't use this item right now.
You can't use this item here.
There's a card here with an odd message on it, about how this area is 'not yet implemented'. Weird. Maybe you should come back some other time.
It's already night; there's no need to sleep until night again.

< Tip: Some options may be highlighted in blue. This means that they were unlocked earlier, or are shown because of some special reason. Keep in mind, however, that they're not necessarily better than other options. >
< You can save your progress at some safe, private places. Speak with Edgard, the bartender, to get a room in this inn. >
